pr_title: Added an "unsafe" way to retrieve a byte array from `SdkBytes` and `ResponseBytes` without copying the data.

timeline.message:
Added an "unsafe" way to retrieve a byte array from `SdkBytes` and `ResponseBytes` without copying the data.

Reduced the number of payload data copies on some code paths.

Fixes #1959.

timeline.bodyText: Should we remove this since there's no appreciable difference in benchmarks?
timeline.author: zoewangg
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@
+{
+    "type": "feature",
+    "category": "AWS SDK for Java v2",
+    "description": "Slight performance improvement, from reduced the number of data copies on some code paths."

replies.bodyText: Done, as well as removed the actual changes that use the new methods.
replies.author: millems
